itemsArr.title: Cards

itemsArr.title: RecyclerView
itemsArr.description: An example of Android Support Library's RecyclerView.

itemsArr.title: MediaPlayer
itemsArr.description: MediaPlayer is a library in the Android multimedia framework which includes support for playing a variety of common media types, which makes integrating audio, video and images into applications easy.

itemsArr.title: MediaPlayer with notification
itemsArr.description: Demo which shows how to integrate the MediaPlayer library with Android notifications and notification channels, if applicable.

itemsArr.title: MediaPlayer with streaming
itemsArr.description: Demo which shows how to stream music from online.
